name: payload
description: Payload is a headless CMS and application framework for building custom APIs, admin UIs, and content workflows. It supports TypeScript, plugins, and self-hosting or cloud deployment.

features.title: REST API
features.description: API-first content management with flexible content modeling and automatic REST and GraphQL API generation

features.title: Custom Admin Ui
features.description: Auto-generated admin interface based on your schema with customizable components and layouts

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Granular permissions system controls who can read, create, update, or delete content at field and

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Extend functionality with plugins for SEO, search, storage, authentication, and custom business logic

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and manage media files with automatic image optimization, resizing, and cloud storage integration
